attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: US investigators are leveraging artificial intelligence to identify child abuse images that are increasingly generated by AI technology.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Drones, previously used only by police, are now being offered for private security by Flock Safety, allowing businesses to pursue shoplifters more actively.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Gemini Robotics has launched version 1.5, introducing advanced AI agents capable of performing complex tasks autonomously by perceiving, planning, and using tools.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The Frontier Safety Framework is being reinforced to address the severe risks posed by advanced AI systems, ensuring safer developments in AI technologies.
